main event: Two separate UFO sightings reported by airmen in Texas during December 1952.
interesting points: One sighting involved an oblong white object at about 230 ft altitude that remained stationary for 2-3 mins.,Four airmen were involved in the sighting., The object was bright and estimated to be of a G-5a size., A separate sighting reported fast-moving round white objects at 40,000 feet observed for about 10 minutes., No known aircraft could explain the sightings.
sighted object: oblong white object and round white fast-moving objects
